name: Goji Berries (Dried)
properties: Better choice than raisins for weight loss
benefits: Goji berries are highlighted in the Amping AMPK and Inflammation Quenchers sections as a better dried fruit choice than raisins for weight loss optimization. They activate AMPK, a metabolic master switch that promotes fat burning. Rich in antioxidants and have anti-inflammatory properties.
amount: Small amounts to replace raisins in oatmeal or salads

quotes: If we did want to use dried, as we learned in the Amping AMPK and Inflammation Quenchers sections, barberries or gojis might be a better choice.
